name: Chromatic scales, Chromatic scale with sharps
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Chromatic scales, Chromatic scale with sharps" do
    expected = ["C","C#","D","D#","E","F","F#","G","G#","A","A#","B"]
    actual = chromatic "C"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Chromatic scales, Chromatic scale with flats
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Chromatic scales, Chromatic scale with flats" do
    expected = ["F","Gb","G","Ab","A","Bb","B","C","Db","D","Eb","E"]
    actual = chromatic "F"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Scales with specified intervals, Simple major scale
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Scales with specified intervals, Simple major scale" do
    expected = ["C","D","E","F","G","A","B","C"]
    actual = interval "C" "MMmMMMm"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Scales with specified intervals, Major scale with sharps
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Scales with specified intervals, Major scale with sharps" do
    expected = ["G","A","B","C","D","E","F#","G"]
    actual = interval "G" "MMmMMMm"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual
